title: New: Fear Of Men – Born
body:
I swear to god, I haven’t heard anything by Brighton/London based group, **[Fear of Men](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16285-new-fear-of-men-green-sea/ "New: Fear of Men – Green Sea")**, that I haven’t been compelled to listen to, over and over, to the point of insanity. Case in point, the B-side to their new single, **_[Green Sea](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16285-new-fear-of-men-green-sea/ "New: Fear of Men – Green Sea")_**, a blisteringly fresh expression of hope and identity.

It’s going to be a great summer.
